meaning: eye, class, look, insight, experience, care, favor

onyomiExamples.meaning: order, item (of a budget revision, etc.), counter for go pieces, counter for surrounded positions (in go)
eyes and ears, seeing and hearing, one's attention, one's interest
one's true nature, one's original face

kunyomiExamples.meaning: eye, eyeball, eyesight, sight, vision, look, stare, gaze, glance, notice, attention, observation, eyes (of the world, public, etc.), an experience, viewpoint, discrimination, discernment, judgement, eye (e.g. for quality), appearance, chance to succeed, possibility, spacing (between crossed strands of a net, mesh, etc.), opening, stitch, texture, weave, grain (of wood), eye (of a storm, needle, etc.), intersection (on a go board), square (on a chess board), dot (on a dice), pip, rolled number, graduation, division (of a scale), tooth (of a saw, comb, etc.), ordinal number suffix, somewhat, -ish, point (e.g. of change)
mark, guide, landmark, purpose, aim, goal, intention, end, sight (on a firearm)
bull's-eye (pattern), double ring (pattern), umbrella with bull's-eye pattern
